maintenance.title: Maintenance in progress
maintenance.explanation-1:
In order to offer you an ever more efficient website
Make.org is currently in maintenance.
maintenance.explanation-2: Please come back in a few minutes.

cookie-alert: By continuing your navigation on our site, you hereby accept the use of cookies providing you with a personalised and smooth experience.

welcome.title: Propose, vote, act
welcome.subtitle: Make.org is an independent initiative in the service of the general public.

article-1.intro: politics are no longer enough, let's move the lines together
article-1.title: Propose, vote, act
article-1.item-1: Vote for the proposals you stand for
article-1.item-2: Submit your ideas on themes that inspire you
article-1.item-3: And tomorrow, initiate concrete actions on the ground

article-2.title: Make.org, neutral & independent
article-2.text: Make.org is a civic, European and independent initiative.

confirmation.title: Thank you!
confirmation.info:
Your proposal has been taken into consideration, it will now be reviewed by our moderation service.
You will receive an email once it has been validated.

introduction.title: Thousands of citizens are submitting solutions.
introduction.explanation-1: Take a stand on these solutions and offer yours.
introduction.explanation-2: The ones with the most support will determine future actions.

presentation.title: Why this consultation
presentation.community-text: Thousands of citizens commit themselves by participating in the consultation.
presentation.also-text: They support the consultation and the citizen action plan that will follow.

actions.goals: A l'issue de la consultation, citoyens et partenaires de la Grande Cause se r√©uniront pour construire le plan d'actions citoyen inspir√© par les r√©sultats de la consultation
actions.know-more: en savoir + sur le calcul des r√©sultats
actions.register-bait: Vous souhaitez √™tre inform√©(e) du lancement des ateliers et du d√©but des actions sur ce sujet ?
actions.support-text: Vous pourrez suivre ici les avanc√©es et succ√®s sur les diff√©rentes actions et vous aurez √† tout moment la possibilit√© d'y prendre part.
actions.actionplan-text: Vous trouverez ici le plan d'actions citoyen issu de la consultation.
actions.actionplan-list-title: Qu'est ce qu'une action sur Make.org ?
actions.actionpan-list-intro: Pour nous une action se doit d'√™tre :
actions.actions-list-item1: - citoyenne car issue de vos propositions, celles qui ont √©merg√© de la consultation,
actions.actions-list-item2: - collective, et toujours ouverte √† toutes et tous,
actions.actions-list-item3: - avec un impact fort, r√©el et mesurable.
actions.partners-text: Chez Make.org nous sommes convaincus que c'est en rassemblant tous les acteurs de la soci√©t√© civile (citoyens mais aussi entreprises, associations, institutions, ...) que nous pourrons changer la donne.

article.title: Why this consultation ?
article.text: Violence against women is at the heart of political events and news coverage. Mindsets are changing. But it all begins now. It is up to us to transform this generalised awareness into concrete actions and to provide a decisive response to this epidemic.
